answers.answer: O and ive had nausea my whole pregnancy so that doesnt help and ive had shortness of breathe for weeks(i have asthma and its been humid plus my son pushing on my lungs)
Well cinnamon lowers blood pressure but I'd call you on and ask what to do he may just have you come in to test for it

Your doctor will be able to evaluate your symptoms by checking your urine. Let him/her know youve been dizzy with headaches. If there is protein present in the urine sample you give tomorrow, they will make you do a 24 hour urine collection. That will tell them whether or not you have preeclampsia in most cases.

I have a appointment tomorrow
